name: RUNNING-PRACTICE-WEB-APP
description: I have decided to create RUN THE STREETS OF QUEENS AND KINGS website because i want to encourage people to run everyday for body fittness and it is health for our bodies. I do run everyday , and for the past 10 years i have understood what is required so that we stay fit. I decided to share what my knowledge and to allow others to share theirs through this website. I am hope that this website will help people in their daily lives.
